sentences.en: Beware the sharks when you are making up your mind how to invest.
sentences.cn: 当你决定如何投资时要提防诈骗者。

sentences.en: He took one look at the great fish as he watched the shark close in.
sentences.cn: 他注视着鲨鱼在逼近,抽空朝那条大鱼望上一眼.

sentences.en: He was just about to dive when he saw the shark.
sentences.cn: 他正要扎进水里,这时他看见了鲨鱼.

sentences.en: He was looking steadily toward the shark coming.
sentences.cn: 他死死盯着迫近的鲨鱼.

sentences.en: I would like shark's fin and sea cucumber to be served.
It could have been a marlin or a broadbill or a shark.
sentences.cn: 很可能是条大马林鱼,或者剑鱼,或者鲨鱼.

sentences.en: Many of the crew died a terrible death as they thrashed about in shark-infested waters.
sentences.cn: 很多船员在鲨鱼成群的水域中拼命挣扎，死状惨不忍睹。

sentences.en: Panic swept through the swimmers as they saw the shark approaching.
sentences.cn: 游泳的人看见鲨鱼靠近时一片惊慌.

sentences.en: Sharks were circling around our boat.
sentences.cn: 鲨鱼在我们的小船周围游弋。

sentences.en: The fisherman transfixed the shark with a harpoon.
The old man knew that he was dead but the shark would not accept it.
sentences.cn: 老人知道这鲨鱼快死了,但它还是不肯认输.

sentences.en: The old man withdrew the blade and punched the shark exactly in the same spot again.
sentences.cn: 老人拔出刀刃,朝同一地方又扎了那鲨鱼一下.

sentences.en: The shark dived down and swam under the boat.
sentences.cn: 鲨鱼急速潜入水中，在船下游动。

sentences.en: The shark let go and rolled away.
sentences.cn: 鲨鱼松了嘴,一翻身就走了.

sentences.en: The shark was writhing around wildly, trying to get free.
sentences.cn: 鲨鱼拼命挣扎，试图逃脱。

sentences.en: The'seed " itself might be the tooth of a prehistoric shark.
sentences.cn: 这颗 “ 种子 ” 本身也许是一颗史前鲨鱼的牙齿.

trans.tran_cn: 鲨鱼，坑蒙拐骗的人，诈骗者，[俚]老手
trans.tran_en: a large sea fish with several rows of very sharp teeth that is considered to be dangerous to humans
